K8sSec.title: Securing Kubernetes Deployments
K8sSec.details:
Our experts help you
  • Deploy container workloads securely
  • Make sure only secured deployments are deployed
  • Mitigate any deployment vulnerabilities
  • Continuously monitor and enforce container deployment security
Making sure your container workload secure by default

points.why:
Kubernetes has been increasingly popular application hosting platform, but it's inherently risky because of its open and shared nature.
Kubernetes is based on contributions from multiple open source communities and there's no sole entity in charge of its security.
Traditional security controls like firewall doesn't work in Kubernetes
points.when:
Ideally, we want to be engaged at the early stage before your product release as it can ensure your product deployment security.

you can engage us if your cyber team raise any vulnerability about your pod deployments.

or you can engage us after any relevant security incident so we can make sure your pod deployment won't be the cause and immune from similar breach.

points.how: In ACloud, we're Kubernetes certified specialists and have assessed over 100+ container based workload deployments so we know how to secure your deployment properly.

K8sSec.title: Securing Container Images and Containers
K8sSec.details:
Our experts help you
  • Optimize Container Images
  • Enforce container image security
  • Minimize container CVEs
  • Secure public images locally
Making sure your container workloads are secure

points.headwhy: Why Container Image and Container Security Matters?
points.why:
Container images often consist of multiple layers that depends on tools/library beyond your controls.
Your development choices often indirectly decide its dependencies that could inherit unmitigated CVEs.
Multi-layer dependence and constant technology and threat landscape evolution often lead safe images to be vulnerable.
External dependence's on images in public or untrusted image repositories
points.when:
Ideally, we want to be engaged at the early stage of your software development as it can help you choose an optimal path from the beginning.

You can engage us whenever you struggle to address your container vulnerabilities.

points.who: You. Anyone who develop container based workloads or provides CaaS (Container as a service).
points.headhow: What Methodologies and Tools to Use?
points.how: In ACloud, we're Docker certified specialists and have gone through the journey to help multiple customer address the exact same challenges so we have the secret tools to assist you.
